reviewText: Another purchase for my niece and bit for myself - I remember watching these on PBS after school or on the weekends. Such a cute show - wish they would release the entire show - but I have gotten almost all of the DVD's with 2-3 episodes on it. She loves Junior - which McKinley reminds me of; enthusiastic little kid energy.
My daughter just loves this character. It is funny to see a very small "person" in a regular size family. It is different, but my daughter loves it. So I guess I will continue to buy these episodes.
My son loves this movie and when it was removed from YouTube, we knew we had to buy it if we could get it for a decent price. So thankful it was available through Amazon at a reasonable price.
A great DVD with three really good episodes of George Shrinks and a bonus episode of Seven Little Monsters. I wish this show was still being made. We own all of the DVD's that are available.
